artist: Artist: Pierre Bonnard; Publisher: Ambroise Vollard
creditline: Gift of Mrs. John Sargent Pillsbury, Sr.
portfolio: From Quelques Aspects de la Vie de Paris (Some Scenes of Parisian Life), 1899
provenance: Vollard before WWI (several times at MIA and U of M).  Mrs. John Sargent Pillsbury, Sr., Minneapolis, given to MIA,1980.
text: This is the view from the window of Bonnard's studio in Montmartre near the Place de Clichy. The artist was deeply attached to his neighborhood during the 1890s, and regularly depicted the area in his prints and paintings.
title: Maison dans la Cour
